visual.name: zebraBiCards
visual.description: Stunning cards with charts. Perfect for your dashboards

dataRoles.description: Drop a calendar data field here, such as month, quarter, years, etc.
dataRoles.name: Category

dataRoles.description: Drop a field containing a list of your KPIs here to create multiple cards.
dataRoles.name: Group

dataRoles.description: Add a measure here to display actual values.
dataRoles.name: Values

dataRoles.description: Add a measure for previous year (PY) here to display comparison vs. previous year.
dataRoles.name: PreviousYear

dataRoles.description: Add a measure for plan, budget, goal or a benchmark here to display comparison vs. plan.
dataRoles.name: Plan

dataRoles.description: Add a measure for forecast or estimation here to display forecasts or estimations.
dataRoles.name: Forecast

dataRoles.description: Data fields added here will appear in tooltips as additional descriptions.
dataRoles.name: Tooltips

dataRoles.description: Add a text field containing comments to display comments in cards.
dataRoles.name: Comments

dataRoles.description: Add descriptions of KPIs in cards.
dataRoles.name: KPI Descriptions

cardsInRow.description: Maximum number of cards displayed in 1 row

suppressNullCards.description: Do not display cards if all values are empty or null

compactCards.description: Make sure there are no empty spaces between cards

cardBackgroundColor.description: Changes background color for all cards

cardColorHighlight.description: Changes color highlight for all cards

cardBorderColor.description: Changes border color for all cards

enumeration.description: Display only relative variance in cards
Display only absolute variance in cards
Display both relative and absolute variance in cards
Display the number with both relative and absolute variance in cards
Display the number with absolute variance in cards
Display the number with relative variance in cards
Do not display any variance in cards
Display waterfall chart in cards. Recommended when cards are big.
Display integrated variance column chart in cards
Display area chart in cards. Recommended when cards are small.

sumACandFC.description: Toggles sum of AC and FC values

cardVarianceCap.description: Set % relative variance where icons have maximum size

interactions.description: Enable/disable interactive features in view mode (for end-users)

viewModeToolbar.description: Show global toolbar in view mode

viewModeCardToolbar.description: Show card toolbar in view mode

viewModeCardToolbarFocusMode.description: Show focus mode in view mode

viewModeCardToolbarDrillThrough.description: Show drill through in view mode

viewModeFocusModeToolbar.description: Show focus mode toolbar in view mode

viewModeVarianceCalculation.description: Change variance calculation in view mode
